text: Christmas will apparently be extra special this year, as Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton are reportedly planning a ‘ blowout ’ holiday wedding! Not to mention, the new report claims they could have a baby girl on the way, and it ’ s a ‘ dream come true ’ for Gwen! Get all of the insane alleged details on their upcoming plans! Blake Shelton, 40, and Gwen Stefani, 47, apparently have two huge reasons to celebrate! Gwen has allegedly been planning their epic Christmas nuptials in Blake ’ s home state of Oklahoma, according to Life & Style. On top of that, the magazine claims they ’ ve been “ trying ” to conceive, and alleged friends “ believe she could already be pregnant. ” WHAT! Gwen has been longing for a baby girl because she ’ s felt “ outnumbered ”
